class.name: MCRCategoryLink
class.query: SELECT cat.categID, count(distinct link.objectReference.objectID) as num FROM MCRCategoryLink link, MCRCategoryImpl cat, MCRCategoryImpl cattree WHERE cattree.internalID = link.category AND cattree.rootID=:classID AND cat.rootID=:classID AND cat.categID in (:categIDs) AND cattree.left BETWEEN cat.left AND cat.right GROUP BY cat.categID

SELECT cat.categID, count(distinct link.objectReference.objectID) as num FROM MCRCategoryLink link, MCRCategoryImpl cat, MCRCategoryImpl cattree WHERE cattree.internalID = link.category AND link.objectReference.type=:type AND cattree.rootID=:classID AND cat.rootID=:classID AND cat.categID in (:categIDs) AND cattree.left BETWEEN cat.left AND cat.right GROUP BY cat.categID

SELECT cat.categID, count(distinct link.objectReference.objectID) as num FROM MCRCategoryLink link, MCRCategoryImpl cat, MCRCategoryImpl cattree WHERE cattree.internalID = link.category AND cattree.rootID=:classID AND cat.rootID=:classID AND cat.parent.internalID=:parentID AND cattree.left BETWEEN cat.left AND cat.right GROUP BY cat.categID

SELECT cat.categID, count(distinct link.objectReference.objectID) as num FROM MCRCategoryLink link, MCRCategoryImpl cat, MCRCategoryImpl cattree WHERE cattree.internalID = link.category AND link.objectReference.type=:type AND cattree.rootID=:classID AND cat.rootID=:classID AND cat.parent.internalID=:parentID AND cattree.left BETWEEN cat.left AND cat.right GROUP BY cat.categID
DELETE FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE objectReference.objectID IN (:ids)
SELECT objectReference.objectID FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE category.rootID=:rootID and category.categID=:categID
SELECT objectReference.objectID FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE category.rootID=:rootID and category.categID=:categID and objectReference.type=:type
SELECT category.rootID, category.categID FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE objectReference.objectID=:id
SELECT 'true' FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE category.internalID IN (:internalIDs)
